entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
